casebody.data:
LAPIDUS
v.
SIEMENS POWER TRANSMISSION. No. COA07-784. No. COA07-836. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed May 20, 2008. Certification Date June 9, 2008. Appeal from NC Industrial Commission (I.C. NO. 162240, I.C. NO. 836986).

Cases reported without published opinion. Remanded; Affirmed.
